article_title: Regulation Drives M&A, Especially in Health Care
article_text:
Regulation Drives M&A, Especially in Health Care

The Affordable Care Act has made many health care companies eager to consolidate, says Baird Capital partner Mike Bernstein, in this video shot at the Bonnet Creek Conference Center in Orlando, Florida, at InterGrowth 2015. "This huge, complex industry reacts really quickly to external drivers like regulation, but otherwise doesnt move at all," he adds. For more, see 5 Technologies Driving Health Care M&A.
